Sentence: Jarndyce, along with Ada Clare and Richard Carstone
Esther says she (Esther) is sure that Ada and Richard are falling in love
Jarndyce warns Ada and Richard to end their romantic relationship since Richard is joining the army
Ada reveals to Esther that she (Esther) and Richard have been secretly married
Ada is pregnant and hopes the baby will distract Richard from his (Richard) obsession with the lawsuit
